projects.name: ATRIUM
projects.summary: This project developed a framework for real-time simulation and visualization of granular materials using AI-based predictions trained on classical simulation data. The approach enables faster, more detailed simulations even on less powerful devices.

projects.name: MobiliAR
projects.summary: This project explored applications of augmented reality, computer vision, and artificial intelligence to enhance digital furniture sales, enabling customers to virtually place, measure, and configure furniture in their own spaces.
